      • DiagramView

        public DiagramView(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
           int style,
           Palette palette,
           org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display,
           DiagramClient diagramClient,
           AbstractDiagram diagram,
           org.eclipse.swt.custom.CTabItem tabItem)
        Instantiates a new diagram view.
        Parameters:
        parent - section of the main shell
        style - display style
        palette - different palette mapping to differnt views
        display - SWT display
        diagramClient - client register into xmf
        diagram - diagram instance of each view
        tabItem - tabItem to be shown into the shell
